src:
Meet new White House staffer Paula White, Trump's "prosperity gospel" advisor
05 Nov 2019, 16:32 by Mark Frauenfelder
The fact that Trumped hired his spiritual advisor Paula White to come to work for him tells you everything you need to know about her. This video will add no new information. It's for entertainment purposes only. Skip to :47 if you want to see her speaking in High Valyrian.




Image: Twitter
